mapper.select: select serve.id, st.id serve_type_id, st.name serve_type_name, si.id serve_item_id, si.name serve_item_name, serve.sale_status, si.reference_price, serve.region_id, serve.price, serve.is_hot, serve.create_time, serve.update_time from serve inner join serve_item si on serve.serve_item_id = si.id inner join serve_type st on si.serve_type_id = st.id where region_id = #{regionId}
